DICE Firmware Compiled on 8 Oct 2009
Main Page | Modules | Alphabetical List | Data Structures | Data Fields | Related Pages

I2C Interface
[Programming Utilities]

Detailed Description

This module provides an interface between this device to other i2c slave devices.

Dice device always acts as master device.


Enumerations

enum  i2c_mode_t { I2C_7_BIT_ADDR, I2C_10_BIT_ADDR }
 I2C address mode. More...
enum  i2c_speed_t { I2C_STANDARD_SPEED = 1, I2C_FAST_SPEED, I2C_HIGH_SPEED }

Functions

 Read bufLength bytes into buf, max I2C_RX_TX_BUF_SIZE bytes at a time.

 Read one byte from target address.

 Setup I2C address mode and speed.

 Write bufLength (<=I2C_RX_TX_BUF_SIZE) bytes to targetAddress.
uint32 i2cWrite2Value (uint16 targetAddress, uint8 v1, uint8 v2)
 Write 2 bytes to target address.
uint32 i2cWriteValue (uint16 targetAddress, uint8 value)
 Write a single byte to targetAddress.

Enumeration Type Documentation

enum i2c_mode_t
 

I2C address mode.

Enumeration values:
I2C_7_BIT_ADDR  ... 7 bit address mode
I2C_10_BIT_ADDR  ... 10 bit address mode

enum i2c_speed_t
 

I2C speed.

Enumeration values:
I2C_STANDARD_SPEED  ... standard speed, up to 100kbps
I2C_FAST_SPEED  ... fast speed, up to 400kbps
I2C_HIGH_SPEED  ... high speed, up to 3.4Mbps
